;----------------
;----------------
; hit spark
; s [0] ; sparkno = 0
; m [1] ; sparkno = 1
; l [2] ; sparkno = 2
; sp[3] ; sparkno = 3
; hp[4] ; sparkno = 4
;----------------
;----------------
; light hit spark / normal
; 通常-小
[begin action 0]
6600,110,0,0,3,,a,0.5,0.5
6600,101,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,1
6600,102,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,2

6600,105,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,5
6600,106,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,6

; 通常-中(小)

;--------------------------
; hyper / super / max2 bg

;;---
